column4: Hello everyone, i have been having some trouble with my internet lately since I moved to 10.10.
my internet on ubuntu seems to be limited to about 7Mbits/s but if i run the test on a windows machines, and or rather a vm inside the ubuntu system, it goes to the max it can which is 25/25
see my post http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1533664 the part of rwin :-)
ok i did the command but there was no change in speedtest
